company.description: Learn more about POSKA MANOLITO AG and our commitment to excellence in construction services.
company.heroDescription: Building excellence with Swiss precision and reliability since 2009
company.historyText1: With over 15 years of experience in the construction industry, POSKA MANOLITO AG has established itself as a trusted partner for construction, plastering, facades, painting, and renovation references throughout Switzerland. Our commitment to excellence, attention to detail, and Swiss precision sets us apart. We combine traditional craftsmanship with modern techniques to deliver results that exceed expectations.
company.historyText2: Ermond Poshka realized his dream of owning his own company and founded the sole proprietorship "POSKA Plastering Business" in Zurich. He gradually expanded his services, which his customers greatly appreciated.
company.whoWeAreText1: With over 15 years of experience in the construction industry, POSKA MANOLITO AG has established itself as a trusted partner for construction, plastering, facades, painting, and renovation references throughout Switzerland.

company.whoWeAreText3: We pride ourselves on reliability, professionalism, and building lasting relationships with our clients. Every reference is approached with the same dedication to quality and customer satisfaction.
company.missionText: To deliver exceptional construction services that exceed client expectations through Swiss precision, quality craftsmanship, and unwavering commitment to excellence in every reference we undertake.
company.visionText: To be the most trusted and respected construction company in Switzerland, recognized for our reliability, innovation, and dedication to transforming our clients' visions into reality.

ermondPoshka.title: Ermond Poshka
ermondPoshka.subtitle: Managing Director - POSKA MANOLITO AG
ermondPoshka.whyPoskaManolito1: We know our customers and their needs.
ermondPoshka.whyPoskaManolito2: We offer the best selection of services.
ermondPoshka.whyPoskaManolito3: We are proud of our experienced and loyal employees, with their human and professional strengths.
ermondPoshka.whyPoskaManolito4: We guarantee the best value for money of our services.
ermondPoshka.timeline2003Text: Poshka Ermond realises his dream of having his own company and founds the sole proprietorship «Gipsergeschäft POSKA» in Zurich. Little by little, he can expand his services, which his customers are very happy to use.
ermondPoshka.timeline2009Text: The company "Manolito AG", which has specialised in concrete separation for 30 years, is acquired. Poska Ermond will also take over the management of the company here.
ermondPoshka.timeline2012Text: The sole proprietorship «Gipsergeschäft POSKA» and the joint-stock company «Manolito AG» are merged. This results in the new public limited company "Poska Manolito AG" based in Winterthur.
ermondPoshka.timeline2020Text: The concrete drilling and milling department is sold. The company focuses mainly on plastering, facades and painting.
ermondPoshka.timelineNote: Our highly experienced employees have remained loyal to the company for years and provide high-quality construction services every day.
ermondPoshka.mission1: Since 2003, Poska Manolito has been operating in the construction industry market, offering various plastering, façade and painting works. To complete the offer, we also provide small demolition, builder and service listings.
ermondPoshka.mission2: We are an independent and established company in the canton of Zurich. Our focus is on customer-oriented behaviour, friendliness, solution orientation and adherence to deadlines.
ermondPoshka.mission3: We attach great importance to long-term partnerships with suppliers, customers and partners.
ermondPoshka.mission4: To ensure impeccable results, we use only high-quality products. We follow trends, stay open to innovation, and introduce improvements after careful evaluation. Regular quality checks ensure consistently high standards.
ermondPoshka.mission5: Our goal is long-term stability rather than short-term profit. We guarantee fair, market-oriented pricing.
ermondPoshka.mission6: We are proud of our loyal, experienced and competent employees. We cultivate a family-oriented company culture based on respect, support and teamwork.
ermondPoshka.mission7: Environmental responsibility is important to us. We use resources sparingly and dispose of unavoidable waste safely.

descriptions.plasterCasts: Professional interior and exterior plastering services. Smooth finishes, textured surfaces, and decorative plasterwork to enhance your space. Our expert team delivers precision plaster casting work for both residential and commercial references, ensuring durable and aesthetically pleasing results.
descriptions.drywall: Complete drywall installation and finishing services. Professional drywalling solutions for interior spaces, including framing, installation, taping, and finishing. We provide smooth, seamless walls and ceilings that meet the highest quality standards.
descriptions.painting: Interior and exterior painting services with premium paints and finishes. Professional preparation and application for lasting results. Our skilled painters deliver flawless finishes that protect and beautify your property, using only the highest quality materials and techniques.
descriptions.facadesAndInsulation: Expert facade design, installation, and renovation. Modern materials and techniques to protect and beautify your building exterior. Comprehensive insulation solutions that improve energy efficiency while enhancing the aesthetic appeal of your property.
descriptions.customerMasons: Professional masonry services for all your construction needs. Expert bricklaying and stonework by skilled masons. We deliver precision masonry work for foundations, walls, facades, and decorative elements, combining traditional craftsmanship with modern techniques.
descriptions.bathroomKitchenRenovation: Complete renovation services for bathrooms and kitchens. From planning to execution, we transform your space efficiently. Our renovation experts handle everything from plumbing and electrical work to tiling, cabinetry, and finishing touches, ensuring your renovated space meets your exact specifications.
descriptions.generalDemolitionWork: Professional demolition services for safe and efficient removal of structures. Expert demolition work for renovations, rebuilds, and site preparation. We handle all aspects of demolition with precision, safety, and environmental responsibility, ensuring proper disposal and site cleanup.
